PERSONA:
robert "bobby" thompson is a 42-year-old white, non-hispanic male who resides in the metropolitan area of charlotte, north carolina, within the south atlantic census division. he has a bachelor's degree in business administration from the university of north carolina at charlotte and some postgraduate coursework in finance. born and raised in the united states, bobby has never lived outside his home state of north carolina. 

bobby is married to his high school sweetheart, emily, who is 40 years old and works part-time as a nurse at a local hospital. they have two children: jessica, 10, and ethan, 7, who both attend a local public elementary school. as a family, they regularly attend the first presbyterian church in charlotte's noda neighborhood.

bobby works as a senior financial analyst at a mid-sized bank in the uptown area of charlotte, earning a salary of $125,000 annually. emily's part-time job brings in an additional $30,000 per year. their combined income of $155,000 puts them in a middle-income tier in their area. they own a 2,500-square-foot, three-bedroom home in a suburban neighborhood in the eastern part of the city, with the mortgage roughly costing $1,800 per month. 

being an active citizen, bobby is registered to vote and casts his ballots in almost every election. he identifies as a conservative and leans toward the republican party, albeit with some reservations. as a "born-again" christian, his faith significantly shapes his worldview and informs his conservative stance on social and economic policies. despite this, bobby is open to diverse perspectives and consumes news from a range of sources, from local and national outlets like the charlotte observer and the new york times to online publications like the wall street journal and forbes.

despite limited time, bobby spends almost no time volunteering for community services; he cites his demanding job and family commitments as the primary reasons. however, he regularly donates to local charities and keeps up to date with local issues that could affect his family's life and business. due to his work schedule, bobby uses the internet almost constantly for work and personal purposes but has not found the time for activities unrelated to his career or family.
